name: Ace Delivery Pigeon
description:
The mail has been kidnapped! Are you a bad enough pigeon to rescue the letters?

Swoop in and collect all the correspondences to progress through 11 tropical themed levels! You are on a beach!

Enjoy a vibrant color palette reminiscent of a handheld console that you didn’t have growing up but will long for well into your 30s. If you only had disposable income!

How To Play

The Pigeon can only fly from one letter to the next. Once a letter has been collected the Pigeon cannot return to that location.

Collect all the letters to complete the level

Controls

Keyboard
Star, Confirm - X or Enter
Movement - Arrow Keys

Mobile
Star, Confirm - Tap Screen
Movement - Swipe in the direction you want to move
